Package message

Class Message

java.lang.Object
message.Message
public class Message extends Object
Used to generate messages for sending and to convert received messages.

  • Constructor Summary

    • addConvertFormat

      public void addConvertFormat(String originalFormat, String destinationFormat)
      Add the format the user can convert from and to.
      Parameters:
      originalFormat - The original format of the file data in the announced message.
      destinationFormat - The format it will be converted to.
